tool_description: Tracks reviewer responses to invitations, manages follow-ups, and maintains status updates throughout the recruitment process.

invitation_ids.description: List of invitation identifiers to track

track_duration.description: Number of days to track responses

error_messages: Invalid invitation IDs: Some provided invitation identifiers do not exist or are inactive.
Track duration out of range: Duration must be between 1 and 60 days.
Too many invitations: Limit to 100 invitations for effective tracking.
usage: Provide invitation_ids to track reviewer responses. Set track_duration to specify how long to monitor for responses and manage follow-ups.

response_statuses.description: Current status of each invitation: accepted, declined, pending, expired

response_times.description: Timestamps of responses for each invitation

follow_up_needed.description: Boolean flags indicating if follow-up is needed for each invitation

tracking_summary.description: Summary of response tracking status and next actions
